channel.title: Too many players = disconnection for players?
channel.description:
Hello fellow moparscape users,
When my server gets more then say 15 people, it sometimes disconnects some players, and on the moparscape client, at the bottom it says "error - (players name) too many players.
I think my server needs an update, which will handle more players.
Anyone got any tuts, or any spare coding lying around which will help me?
-- Thanks for taking the time to read my topic --

item.title: Too many players = disconnection for players?

item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

It may depend on your computer?

Read full topic

No, i have my max connections set correctly, it’s not that.

item.title: Too many players = disconnection for players?
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

go into server.java or player.java (i cant remember :p) and search for max connections =

change the number after the = to 10000,
there u go
